mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def detect_outliers(lst):
    mean = np.mean(lst)
    std_dev = np.std(lst)
    outliers = [x for x in lst if abs(x - mean) > 2 * std_dev]
    return len(outliers) >= 0

    return len(outliers) <= 0
